name: Understanding AEM Concepts
desc: Interactive MCQs with cartoons to simplify complex Operating System topics.

slides.questionEn: **Identify the verb in this sentence:** 'She runs quickly.'
slides.questionEnSpeak: In the sentence 'She runs quickly', identify the word that is the verb.
slides.questionHi: **इस वाक्य में क्रिया को पहचानें:** 'वह तेजी से दौड़ती है।'
slides.questionHiSpeak: वाक्य 'वह तेजी से दौड़ती है' में, क्रिया कौन सा शब्द है?

rightAnswer.speaking: The correct option is number two: runs

slides.explanationEn: In this sentence, 'runs' is the verb as it describes the action being performed.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: In this sentence, the word 'runs' is the verb because it describes an action.

slides.questionEn: **Find the adverb in the sentence:** 'The cat slept soundly.'
slides.questionEnSpeak: In the sentence 'The cat slept soundly', find the word that is the adverb.
slides.questionHi: **इस वाक्य में क्रिया-विशेषण को खोजें:** 'बिल्ली ने गहरी नींद ली।'
slides.questionHiSpeak: वाक्य 'बिल्ली ने गहरी नींद ली' में, क्रिया-विशेषण कौन सा शब्द है?

rightAnswer.speaking: The correct option is number four: soundly

slides.explanationEn: In this sentence, 'soundly' is the adverb, as it describes how the cat slept.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: In this sentence, the word 'soundly' is the adverb because it describes the manner in which the cat slept.

slides.questionEn: **Which word is a noun in this sentence:** 'The tree is tall.'
slides.questionEnSpeak: In the sentence 'The tree is tall', identify the noun.
slides.questionHi: **इस वाक्य में संज्ञा कौन सा शब्द है:** 'वृक्ष लंबा है।'
slides.questionHiSpeak: वाक्य 'वृक्ष लंबा है' में, संज्ञा कौन सा शब्द है?

rightAnswer.speaking: The correct option is number two: tree

slides.explanationEn: In this sentence, 'tree' is the noun because it is a name of an object.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: In this sentence, the word 'tree' is the noun because it is the name of an object.

slides.questionEn: **Identify the verb in the following sentence:** 'They laughed at the joke.'
slides.questionEnSpeak: In the sentence 'They laughed at the joke', find the verb.
slides.questionHi: **निम्नलिखित वाक्य में क्रिया को पहचानें:** 'उन्होंने मजाक पर हँसा।'
slides.questionHiSpeak: वाक्य 'उन्होंने मजाक पर हँसा' में, क्रिया कौन सा शब्द है?

rightAnswer.speaking: The correct option is number two: laughed

slides.explanationEn: In this sentence, 'laughed' is the verb as it represents the action.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: In this sentence, the word 'laughed' is the verb because it represents an action.

slides.questionEn: **Choose the adverb in the sentence:** 'He spoke loudly during the meeting.'
slides.questionEnSpeak: In the sentence 'He spoke loudly during the meeting', identify the adverb.
slides.questionHi: **इस वाक्य में क्रिया-विशेषण को चुनें:** 'उसने मीटिंग के दौरान जोर से बात की।'
slides.questionHiSpeak: वाक्य 'उसने मीटिंग के दौरान जोर से बात की' में, क्रिया-विशेषण कौन सा शब्द है?

rightAnswer.speaking: The correct option is number three: loudly

slides.explanationEn: In this sentence, 'loudly' is the adverb, as it describes how he spoke.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: In this sentence, the word 'loudly' is the adverb because it describes the manner in which he spoke.

slides.questionEn: **Find the noun in the sentence:** 'The book on the table is old.'
slides.questionEnSpeak: In the sentence 'The book on the table is old', identify the noun.
slides.questionHi: **इस वाक्य में संज्ञा को खोजें:** 'मेज पर रखी किताब पुरानी है।'
slides.questionHiSpeak: वाक्य 'मेज पर रखी किताब पुरानी है' में, संज्ञा कौन सा शब्द है?

rightAnswer.speaking: The correct option is number two: book

slides.explanationEn: In this sentence, 'book' is the noun as it refers to an object.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: In this sentence, the word 'book' is the noun because it refers to an object.

slides.questionEn: **Identify the verb in this sentence:** 'She writes an email every day.'
slides.questionEnSpeak: In the sentence 'She writes an email every day', find the verb.
slides.questionHi: **इस वाक्य में क्रिया को पहचानें:** 'वह रोज एक ईमेल लिखती है।'
slides.questionHiSpeak: वाक्य 'वह रोज एक ईमेल लिखती है' में, क्रिया कौन सा शब्द है?

rightAnswer.speaking: The correct option is number two: writes

slides.explanationEn: In this sentence, 'writes' is the verb because it describes the action being performed.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: In this sentence, the word 'writes' is the verb because it describes an action.

slides.questionEn: **Choose the adverb in the sentence:** 'The flowers bloom beautifully in spring.'
slides.questionEnSpeak: In the sentence 'The flowers bloom beautifully in spring', identify the adverb.
slides.questionHi: **इस वाक्य में क्रिया-विशेषण को चुनें:** 'वसंत में फूल खूबसूरती से खिलते हैं।'
slides.questionHiSpeak: वाक्य 'वसंत में फूल खूबसूरती से खिलते हैं' में, क्रिया-विशेषण कौन सा शब्द है?

rightAnswer.speaking: The correct option is number four: beautifully

slides.explanationEn: In this sentence, 'beautifully' is the adverb, as it describes how the flowers bloom.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: In this sentence, the word 'beautifully' is the adverb because it describes the manner in which the flowers bloom.

slides.questionEn: **Find the noun in the sentence:** 'The sun shines brightly.'
slides.questionEnSpeak: In the sentence 'The sun shines brightly', identify the noun.
slides.questionHi: **इस वाक्य में संज्ञा को खोजें:** 'सूरज तेजी से चमकता है।'
slides.questionHiSpeak: वाक्य 'सूरज तेजी से चमकता है' में, संज्ञा कौन सा शब्द है?

rightAnswer.speaking: The correct option is number two: sun

slides.explanationEn: In this sentence, 'sun' is the noun as it is the name of an object.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: In this sentence, the word 'sun' is the noun because it is the name of an object.
